name: CentralMallTexarkana
0:
”Alexa, ask Central Mall Texarkana what restaurants they have”
”Alexa, ask Central Mall Texarkana if there are any jobs available”
”Alexa, ask Central Mall Texarkana if they have a Bealls”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: central mall texarkana
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Central Mall Texarkana’s skill will let you know all the important information and happenings at the center. Whether you’re curious what type of stores they have, where to get a rideshare, when they will be closing, or what the next upcoming event is, download this skill to be informed on all things at Central Mall Texarkana. You can access this skill on any of your Alexa devices.

To get started, enable Central Mall Texarkana’s skill in the Alexa App or by saying, “Alexa, open Central Mall Texarkana”

If you’re having trouble, please visit www.centralmalltexarkana.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
